workflow.name: XDR-Email Rule With Trigger O/P References
workflow.title: XDR-Email Rule With Trigger O/P References

properties.name: Provide Email ID to Create A Keys and  Send Email
Provide Gmail Password to Create A Keys, SMTP and IMAP Targets

properties.description:
Scenario: Email Event With Variable Reference

1.	Create Email A keys, Targets and Email Rule
2.	Create Email Accounytkeys
3.	Create SMTP Target
4.	Create IMAP Target
5.	Create Email Event
6.	Create Workflow and Add Email Rule to It.
7.	Adding upper and lower actions with trigger Variables
8.	Update the Event with Description
9.	Extract Event Trigger Status Validation
10.	Create 2nd Workflow and executing to send email
11.	Adding send email, Updating Action and execute workflow to trigger a workflow
12.	Waiting 35 seconds to trigger a worklfow
13.	Extracting Email Trigger workflow WF Instance and validate
14.	Verify the trigger workflow instances, and trigger instances count should be 1
15.	Verify Email trigger WF Execution and Validation
16.	Delete Instance, WF, Event, Trigger, Targets, A Keys
17.	Delete Email Event, (SMTP, IMAP Targets) and Accontkey
properties.display_name: XDR-Email Rule With Trigger O/P References

actions.name: Group
actions.title: Create Email A keys, Targets and Event

properties.display_name: Create Email A keys, Targets and Event

properties.body:
{
  "name": "CA SMTP Automation Account-$workflow.definition_workflow_026DLFP4XJQD54fFx2N1AbdwW0GrjK2iwCH.output.start_time$",
  "title": "CA SMTP Automation Account-$workflow.definition_workflow_026DLFP4XJQD54fFx2N1AbdwW0GrjK2iwCH.output.start_time$",
  "properties": {
    "no_runtime_user": false,
    "protocol": "SMTP",
    "display_name": "CA SMTP Automation Account-$workflow.definition_workflow_026DLFP4XJQD54fFx2N1AbdwW0GrjK2iwCH.output.start_time$",
    "default_runtime_user_id": "$activity.definition_activity_026DLFPG01PDK0MKHARFtT48PhVND9b6eH9.output.jsonpath_queries.Email Runtime ID$",
    "server": "smtp.gmail.com",
    "port": 587
  },
  "type": "email.smtp_endpoint",
  "base_type": "target"
}

{
  "name": "CA IMAP Automation Account-$workflow.definition_workflow_026DLFP4XJQD54fFx2N1AbdwW0GrjK2iwCH.output.start_time$",
  "title": "CA IMAP Automation Account-$workflow.definition_workflow_026DLFP4XJQD54fFx2N1AbdwW0GrjK2iwCH.output.start_time$",
  "properties": {
    "ignore_certificate_errors": true,
    "port": 993,
    "protocol": "IMAP",
    "tls_enabled": true,
    "polling_interval": 30,
    "display_name": "CA IMAP Automation Account-$workflow.definition_workflow_026DLFP4XJQD54fFx2N1AbdwW0GrjK2iwCH.output.start_time$",
    "default_runtime_user_id": "$activity.definition_activity_026DLFPG01PDK0MKHARFtT48PhVND9b6eH9.output.jsonpath_queries.Email Runtime ID$",
    "server": "imap.gmail.com"
  },
  "type": "email.imap_endpoint",
  "base_type": "target"
}
